title: Owner of the land who is competent and have resources to develop slum on land owned by him shall be allowed to register himself as registered developer, but only for development of slum on land belonging to him
clause_text: Owner of the land who is competent and have resources to develop slum on land owned by him shall be allowed to register himself as registered developer, but only for development of slum on land belonging to him.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
